All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AudioPlayer
A static class that plays various audio clips and applies various effects to them.
Card
A class that represents a card object in the Gameplay scene.
CardLogic
This class deals with all the logic required to get cards into the game, along with calculating damage between any two cards
Enemy
This class represents an enemy on-screen
Entity
This class represents an entity on-screen.
Gameplay
A static class that manages various flags and global mechanics during gameplay.
GameplayController
A class that controls the GUI functionality of the Gameplay screen.
GameSave
Container class to store game save information for a specific user.
InstructorModeController
A controller class for the instructor mode screen.
LeaderboardController
A controller class for the leaderboard screen.
MainMenu
A utility class that manages flags + User related methods for the Main Menu at runtime.
MainMenuController
This class controls the GUI functionality of the Main Menu screen.
MainStage
This class represents the application window, and is the class that runs the entire game.
Player
This class represents a player on-screen
SceneTools
A utility class that helps with managing and controlling scenes in a JavaFX project.
SettingsController
A controller class for the settings screen.
TutorialController
This class represents the controller for the tutorial screen.
User
Container class to store user based information
